passages.text:
You see a wild cat.
Omg so adorable. Much cute.

[[Try to pet it]]
[[Walk away]]
passages.name: A wild cat appears.

passages.text:
You approach the cat. It does not try to run away from you, surprisingly.
You pet the cat.
...
That is the last thing you remember as you black out.

[[Interesting cat...]]
passages.name: Try to pet it

passages.text: You decided to walk away and go on with your life.
passages.name: Walk away

passages.text:
You wake up in unfamiliar bed. Your actions?

[[Look around]]
[[Try to sleep a bit more]]

links.name: Try to sleep a bit more
links.link: Try to sleep a bit more

passages.name: Interesting cat...

passages.text:
This is a very spartan room with only a bed and a door.

[[Try to find secret passages by touching all the walls]]
[[Try to open the door]]

links.name: Try to find secret passages by touching all the walls
links.link: Try to find secret passages by touching all the walls

passages.name: Look around

passages.text:
You try to go back to sleep, but you can't.

[[Maybe I should look aroud?->Look around]]
passages.name: Try to sleep a bit more

passages.text:
After good 10 minutes of searching, you find nothing out of the ordinary.
That is when some kind of alien reptile comes through the door.

[[What the fuck?!->First alien encounter]]
passages.name: Try to find secret passages by touching all the walls

passages.text:
You try to open the door and find it open.
When you try to see through the open door, you come face to face with some kind of alien reptile.

[[Ummm..->First alien encounter]]
passages.name: Try to open the door

passages.text: It is evidently afraid of you, and uses some kind of weapon you didn't notice at first. You never wake up again.
passages.name: First alien encounter
